article_title: Have You Significantly Changed Your Political Views Since Age 18? If So, How?

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: I would like to think that each time I changed my political views, the reason was evidence. But I can't shake the idea that evidence is not the main reason.
og.title: Have You Significantly Changed Your Political Views Since Age 18? If So, How?
